title: A Beauty and the Beast Face Serum Is an Actual Thing
text:
Maybe it's just us, but when Disney announced it was releasing a Beauty and the Beast live-action remake, we expected beauty brands to treat us to all kinds of Belle-inspired makeup. Bar L'Oreal's lipstick and nail polish collection that hasn't really happened yet. So, imagine the excitement for this glow-giving, Lumiere-rivalling face serum...
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Tale as old as time, true as it can be..." Unveiling our much anticipated collaboration with Disney's Beauty and the Beast. We celebrate this timeless story with the creation of an exquisite Limited Edition Disney's Beauty and the Beast Get Glowin' Serum, for all you modern heroines to take control of your skin and let you inner light shine. 6 more days to D-Day. #limitededition #beautyandthebeast #getglowin #customized #serum #cocktail #brightening #beautyisfoundwithin #BeOurGuest #BeOurGuestSG #disney #skininc #iloveskininc #sephorasg #zalorasg
A post shared by Skin Inc Global (@iloveskininc) on Feb 24, 2017 at 5:30am PST
Japanese skincare brand, Skin Inc, has just announced its latest launch: the Skin Inc x Beauty and the Beast Get Glowin' Serum Kit. Unveiled on Instagram, it's "for all you modern heroines to take control of your skin and let you inner light shine," presumably with a Belle-like glow.
And it sounds like it's going to deliver. With a blending of brightening chlorella, pore-plumping hyaluronic acid and vitamin A, it's got all the makings of a hydrating, radiance-boosting skin treatment. Throw in the fact that Skin Inc's serums are famously concentrated, and you've got one seriously potent potion that comes in the prettiest of bottles.
We mean, just look...
A powerpacked, multipurpose serum that boosts glow from deep within, this exquisite Limited Edition Disney's Beauty & the Beast bottle boasts a sunshine hue inspired by Belle's signature gown, it features a rose gold charm which embodies the Enchanted Rose, and lets your inner light shine. It is at 30ml with our glowing concoction of three potent serums that are delivered effectively by our patented Japanese encapsulation technology. Channel your inner Belle today and be the modern day heroine who isn't afraid to define your own beauty and take control of your skin. Link in bio for first hand access to pre-order now. #limitededition #beautyandthebeast #getglowin #customized #serum #cocktail #brightening #beautyisfoundwithin #BeOurGuest #BeOurGuestSG #disney #skininc #iloveskininc #sephorasg #zalorasg
A post shared by Skin Inc Global (@iloveskininc) on Feb 25, 2017 at 3:13am PST
The serum launches on iloveskininc.com for $90 on March 2nd. Given that both Sephora and Beauty Bay stock Skin Inc, we'll be keeping our eyes peeled for this golden bottle in the next few weeks.
